name: Tube Simulator - Clicker Games & Idle Tuber Tycoon
name_original: Tube Simulator - Clicker Games & Idle Tuber Tycoon
description:
Join in! To become a famous tuber! To stun millions of audience with your great talents! And to create incredible shows with fun and joy!

Even as a nobody, you have a golden chance to join the tube and become a successful tuber! With diligent efforts and potential talents, you will rock the world and win the fame. Huge fans, big name and great studios are waiting!

Tap to create as many video as you can, which is the only best method for you to gain great popularity and money as well. Speed up the progress bar by increasing the numbers. Additionally, hiring some assistants and making upgrades are good healpers to accelerate your popularity.

Drop off hesitations and move it! Tube Simulator has prepared a stage for you to show!
